Jokowi Hidupkan Lagi Pos Wakil Panglima TNI, Ini Kata Istana
07 Nov 2019, 11:04 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) kembali menghidupkan posisi Wakil Panglima TNI. Apa kata pihak Istana?
"Posisi terkait dengan wakil menteri, wakil panglima, jelas kriterianya dari bapak, selalu untuk menangani tugas khusus atau tugas prioritas. Periksa saja, dari semua wamen, pasti kriteria tugasnya adalah tugas prioritas yang ingin dikembangkan pemerintah," ujar Stafsus Presiden Fadjroel Rachman di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ketentuan itu tertuang dalam Perpres Nomor 66/2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi TNI yang diteken Jokowi pada 18 Oktober 2019. Jabatan Wakil Panglima TNI sebelumnya terakhir kali dijabat Jenderal (Purn) Fachrul Razi pada 1999-2000.
"Kalaupun itu dilakukan, tampaknya terkait tugas khusus atau tugas pemerintah, atau tugas prioritas dari pemerintah. Saya bisa jawab sebatas itu," ujar Fadjroel.

Jokowi Revives the Deputy Commander of the TNI, This is the Palace Said
Nov 7 2019, 11:04 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) has revived the position of Deputy TNI Commander. What did the palace say?
"The position is related to the deputy minister, deputy commander, clearly the criteria from the father, is always to handle special tasks or priority tasks. Just check, of all the wamen, the criteria for assignment are priority tasks that the government wants to develop," said Stafsus President Fadjroel Rachman in the Complex Presidential Palace, Central Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
The provision was stated in Presidential Decree No. 66/2019 concerning the Organizational Structure of the TNI which was signed by Jokowi on October 18, 2019. The position of Deputy TNI Commander was previously held by the General (Ret) Fachrul Razi in 1999-2000.
"Even if it is done, it seems to be related to specific tasks or tasks of the government, or priority tasks of the government. I can answer to that extent," said Fadjroel.
